title: Pope asks forgiveness after sex scandals rock Vatican and Rome
text:
Pope asks forgiveness after sex scandals rock Vatican and Rome 
Published By: Reuters - Today 
VATICAN CITY (Reuters) - Pope Francis asked for forgiveness on Wednesday for scandals at the Vatican and in Rome, an apparent reference to t...
